[[File:North_American_F86-01.JPG|thumb|An [[United States|American]] F-86.]]
The '''F-86 Sabre''' (nicknamed the "'''Sabre jet'''") was an [[United States|American]] fighter plane made by [[North American Aviation]]. It first flew in [[1947]], and was introduced to battle the [[MiG-15]] in the [[Korean War]]. Unlike the fighter before it, the F-86 had swept wings to be faster.

== Other pages ==
*[[MiG-15]]
